summary: Zach is guy for whom the party never ends. But when he meets the girl he nicknames "Crazy Eyes," the inability to have her, combined with family matters, are signs that his idle life might be due for a change.
cast: Lukas Haas|Madeline Zima|Jake Busey|Tania Raymonde|Blake Garrett Rosenthal|Ray Wise|Valerie Mahaffey|Moran Atias|Ned Bellamy|Laura Miro|Regine Nehy|Joshua Thorpe|Harvey Shield|T. title: Crazy Eyes
